Int16Rec Record

Summary

Represents type Int16Rec.

Namespace: flcStdTypes
Syntax
Delphi
type
 Int16Rec = packed record
 case Integer of
 0 : (Lo, Hi : Byte);
 1 : (Bytes : array[0..1] of Byte);
 end;
